events.comment:
-- Topdown shooter Template --
-- Author: Ulises Freitas <ulises.freitas@gmail.com>

A simple template to demonstrate a topdown shooter created with GDevelop 5
TIP: gs_game_paused could be 0,1,2 0 means the game is running, 1 the game is paused by the player, 2 means game over

TIP: If you want move the player with right click mouse, eneble the two diabled event. Search for #MOVEWITHMOUSE.
In case you don't use this method you can delete all related objects and remove the pathfinding behaviors.
Affected objeccts: obj_player, obj_grass2, obj_tree, obj_node_marker, obj_flag
Issues: Sometimes the enemies are spawned in a tree or mountain, that is not good and is not solved. Is up to you to check the spawns and act in kind.

events.name: #MOVEWITHMOUSE -- Move with mouse right click - Not tested

events.comment: If the animation finish fails then we ensure the enemy bool variable attacking is set to false with the timer.
